div.p: At this moment in time I feel very blessed and there’s nothing that I would like to change at this precise moment in time.
I’ve got a couple of staff who work for me who are more qualified than me, my youth worker who sort of guided me
through youth work now works for me and people say “oh my god that’s mad, your youth worker who guided you...”
and I say but there’s nothing, there’s no ego around it, it’s not like oh yeah you work for me now, there’s nothing like that
because I learned so much from him and he’s got a Diploma, sorry a Degree, but he’s saying to me “no you don’t need to do a Degree Del”
but then I’ve got other people above, not above me, but people in the industry, the council who I liaise with and talk to
that are “oh I think you should look at doing a Degree” so when people say “you need this”, “you need that”
no I don’t as long as I’ve got what I know and my knowledge and experience, yeah, I’ve got a Diploma that’s good enough for me
I don’t need a Degree to be able to say I’m a Youth Worker.
